sentence: The concierge Mary approached us and brought us over to her desk
Fortunately the staff came to my distress and the manger moved me finally to an acceptable room
Staff is awesome location is great
Everything great staff no complaints it was my son birthday weekend they sent up 2 slices of cake and 2 glasses of milk and a handwritten note from the staff
The bellman was very helpful and took our luggage to the room
Nice place very nice service
Staff very friendly and accommodating
The wait staff was very attentive
The parking lot staff were very helpful
Easy access room service
For travelling teams like ours its ridiculous that we ca n’t get our own snack and food supplies that must be kept cold5
Very poor service at the front desk always a line
The hotel staff said well that is your fault you booked from a third party site and did not care when I complained
They hired new front desk staff and now it is 100 better there
Arrived in Philadelphia a bit early and inquired with a front desk agent about the possibility of an early check in even if we had to pay
The staff was comprised of complete idiots with negative attitudes
We wanted to find a little restaurant nearby by recommendation and the concierge the next day drew us a map to a local favorite and it did not disappoint

When we showed up at 40 staff tried to give us a queen room when we reserved a king gave us a room on a different floor than requested on the wrong side of hotel as requested then gave us an argument when we stated we had requested a late checkout which we had had every other time we ’ve been here for the last five years
I have called sales twice since then and my call has gone to voicemail and I have called the front desk twice for no one to answer not even voicemail
Zero stars Mariot needs to renovate its rooms and retrain the front desk staff
